nodes.text: Tracer was a Human male captain in the Republic Military of the Galactic Republic during the Cold War and Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the wars Tracer was stationed on Carrick Station where he sold equipment. Among the items he sold were blasters, such as the D-25 Turbo Disruptor, F-9 Laser Enforcer, and the F-9 Laser Enforcer, and lightsabers.
